de.renew.net

Class DBNetControlLayerInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.renew.net.NetInstanceImpl
      • de.renew.net.DBNetControlLayerInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.renew.engine.searcher.ChannelTarget, de.renew.net.NetInstance, de.renew.util.DelayedFieldOwner, java.io.Serializable

    public class DBNetControlLayerInstance
extends de.renew.net.NetInstanceImpl
    The db-net's control layer's instance.
    Author:
    Anton Rigin, National Research University - Higher School of Economics, Faculty of Computer Science, Master Degree Program "System and Software Engineering", the 1st year student. Term Project (Coursework) on the Topic "Reference and Data Semantic-Based Simulator of Petri Nets Extension with the Use of Renew Tool". HSE University, Moscow, Russia, 2019 - 2020.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
